## IControllerPointerMoveEvent interface

Pointer move event for camera controllers.

Triggered when the pointer (mouse, pen, or touch) moves across the viewport.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerPointerMoveEvent extends IControllerMouseEvent<'pointermove'> 
```
**Extends:** [IControllerMouseEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.icontrollermouseevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;'pointermove'&gt;
